function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Improper disposal of infectious wastes","Impact":"Increased risk of in-hospital transmission of infection or injury","Mitigation":"Proper disposal methods and disinfection procedures","Technologies":"Bleaching powder, chlorine disinfectant, incinerators","People":"Hospital staff, waste management personnel","Owner":"Hospital management, waste disposal agencies"},{"Description":"Improper disinfection of disposable medical supplies","Impact":"Risk of spreading infections through contaminated supplies","Mitigation":"On-site disinfection, centralized collection, and proper disposal","Technologies":"Incineration, chlorine disinfectant","People":"Hospital staff, waste management personnel","Owner":"Hospital management, designated waste collection unit"},{"Description":"Inadequate disposal of pharmaceutical wastes","Impact":"Risk of environmental contamination and public health hazards","Mitigation":"Proper disposal methods, incineration, and storage","Technologies":"Incineration, landfill, storage","People":"Pharmaceutical facility staff, waste management personnel","Owner":"Pharmaceutical facility management, waste disposal agencies"}]}
